h2_title: Black Wind Mountain Celestial Nonary Pill
content: After defeating the Black Wind King and unlocking the Cloud Step spell, continue along the path up the hill until you reach an ambush. Once you've fought through the enemies there, keep climbing to Bodhi Peak and you will find the pill in a golden chest on the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain Celestial Nonary Pill'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the Black Wind King and unlocking the Cloud Step spell, continue along the path up the hill until you reach an ambush. Once you've fought through the enemies there, keep climbing to Bodhi Peak and you will find the pill in a golden chest on the left.
